en.title: On Ambiverts: Why Distinguishing Between Extroverts and Introverts is Inadequate
en.description: I’ve always hated the distinction between introverts and extroverts because I never could identify with either side.

en.title: A Letter to My Teachers
en.description: Dear Teachers, I’ve grown up with you, you have often the first person I see in the mornings, and on some days I’ve spent more time with you in your classrooms than with my family in my own home.
